title: Appeals Court Temporarily Halts Biden’s Student Debt Cancellation
description: A federal appeals court on Friday temporarily halted President Biden’s student debt relief plan, preventing the government from moving forward with the debt cancellation it had said could start as early as next week.
dc:creator: Stacy Cowley and Alan Rappeport
media:credit: Al Drago for The New York Times
media:description: President Joe Biden speaking about student loan forgiveness at Delaware State University on Friday in Dover.
